title: Congress Can Fuel Tech Growth
description: Without prompt action from lawmakers and regulators, much of what fuels a critical segment of the U.S. economy — especially tech-savvy California — is at risk. U.S. wireless networks and the companies that rely on world-class connectivity could experience stagnation or decline due to a shortage of spectrum. Estimates suggest that agencies hold as much as 70 percent of the spectrum… Read More

Estimates suggest that agencies hold as much as 70 percent of the spectrum… Read More
author: Kristie Arslan
